original_text: Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap; which neither have storehouse nor barn; and God feedeth them: how much more are ye better than the fowls?
korean_text: 까마귀를 생각하라 심지도 아니하고 거두지도 아니하며 골방도 없고 창고도 없으되 하나님이 기르시나니 너희는 새보다 얼마나 더 귀하냐

sentences.original_text: for they neither sow nor reap;
which neither have storehouse nor barn;
how much more are ye better than the fowls?
sentences.korean_translation: 하물며 너희가 새보다 얼마나 더 나으냐?
